uk.ac.qmul.sbcs.evolution.convergence

Class TreeBranch

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.qmul.sbcs.evolution.convergence.TreeBranch

  • public class TreeBranch
extends java.lang.Object
    A minimal class to hold branch information. Note that this is intended as a lightweight class, most complicated stuff can be got from the parent or daughter TreeNode objects.
    Author:
    joeparker
    See Also:
    TreeNode
